list.name: SoftUni-AspNet-Core-Project
list.description: Web application with server rendering, using ASP.NET Core backend, EntityFramework Core as a DB ORM, JQuery for the front-end.

list.name: blog-frontend-course-project
list.description: Single page app, blog, sliced from a PSD, using various libraries for the frontend, and a simple Express RESTful API.

list.name: angular-course-project
list.description: Single page app, forum, using Angular 4 on the frontend, and a simple Express RESTful API for the backend.

list.name: nodejs-course-project
list.description: Standard web app, movie library, using Express on the backend and serverside rendering of Pug templates
